details.Description: Developer of virtual primary care platform designed to place an affordable, long-term primary care doctor in every American equitably. The company offers limited texting with their doctor, video appointments, urgent care with the first available doctor, and free doctor answers to any health question from a network of volunteer, U.S. doctors across various specialties, enabling users with convenient access to choose and keep their doctor to orchestrate all their ongoing health needs.
details.Vertical(s):
Big Data,
Digital Health,
SaaS,
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning,
HealthTech,
Mobile

details.Description: Developer of health monitoring devices designed to track and control glucose levels. The company's product is connected to an online glucometer that keeps a record of the readings and connects patients with doctors and experts instantly for real-time guidance if the readings are out of the normal range while also providing daily essentials, enabling diabetic patients to self-manage daily food, activity and blood glucose levels.
Address: FIEE Complex, Okhla Industrial Area, Phase II

details.Description: Developer of a medical consultation application intended to provide quality healthcare that is easily accessible to patients. The company's application helps in consulting a specialist MD Doctor online through a call or chat, sharing reports and receiving online consultations and prescriptions, enabling patients to avail medical support based on their needs and coverage.

details.Description: Developer of a digital healthcare platform designed to provide access to authentic ayurvedic doctors on a global scale. The company's platform offers an online community that permits patients to review doctors and encourages them to create and publish case studies and research reports to bring in evidence-based treatment similar to modern medicine, enabling patients to get the correct adoption of pure Ayurveda in the management and prevention of ailments.

details.Description: Developer of a healthcare platform intended to offer on-demand health consultation services. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to match a patient to a relevant medical specialist based on past history and risk factors and offers customized wellness and outpatient department (OPD) programs, enabling patients to get medical advice through chat, phone, or video, without requiring to visit doctors in person.

details.Description: Developer of contact-free health monitoring equipment designed for continuous tracking of vital signs and wellness. The company's equipment is a non-wearable tracker that monitors heart rate, respiration, sleep patterns, and stress levels, transmitting data to a secure platform for analysis, enabling individuals and healthcare providers to detect early deterioration and manage conditions remotely.
